verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of the sons of Korah, set to Alamoth. A Song.) <S%H430>God<s%> is our <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and <S%H5797>strength,<s%> A <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H4672>present<s%> <S%H5833>help<s%> in <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> we will not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> though the <S%H776>earth<s%> should <S%H4171>change,<s%> And though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H4131>slip<s%> into the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%>
Though its <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1993>roar<s%> [and] <S%H2560>foam,<s%> Though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>quake<s%> at its <S%H1346>swelling<s%> <S%H1346>pride.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

There is a <S%H5104>river<s%> whose <S%H6388>streams<s%> <S%H8055>make<s%> <S%H8055>glad<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> The <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>places<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of her, she will not be <S%H4131>moved;<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> her when <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6437>dawns.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1993>made<s%> an <S%H1993>uproar,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> <S%H4131>tottered;<s%> He <S%H5414>raised<s%> His <S%H6963>voice,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4127>melted.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is with us; The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>stronghold.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H1980>Come,<s%> <S%H2372>behold<s%> the <S%H9282>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> has <S%H7760>wrought<s%> <S%H8047>desolations<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He makes <S%H4421>wars<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> He <S%H7665>breaks<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H7112>cuts<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> in <S%H7112>two;<s%> He <S%H8313>burns<s%> the <S%H5699>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H7503>"Cease<s%> [striving] and <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H430>God;<s%> I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is with us; The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>stronghold.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
